title: Establish The Screener Agent (Rug Pull Defense)
author: Antigravity (User Request)
description: Create a new agent 'agent_screen.py' responsible for vetting meme tokens before the Hunter buys them.
justification: Phase 14 Security Requirement. Prevent capital loss from scams/rugs.

changes: Implement method 'check_safety(symbol) -> float' returning a safety score (0-100).
Include basic checks (mocked for now): Liquidity Locked, Mintable Disabled, Top Holder %.
